name: Stringuin
description:
NOTE: Seems itch is having issues with Web Builds right now, please download the Windows version down below, apologies for the inconvenience =)

NOTE 2: Seems Level 2 might be slightly broken, if you cant open the door with both penguins on their buttons, you can just use the level select to get to level 3

Stringuin is a platforming puzzle game which has the unique element of puzzle-solving with two PENGUINS! Switch the control back and forth between the penguin engineer Punk Flipper and his robot creation Sparky Flipper as you make your way through scenery such as laboratories, floating islands and more! You need to use your brain in order to navigate through the levels while making sure not to pull on the wire between the two of the characters- until you find the Magical Spool of Wire™️!

Controls:
Arrow Keys to Move and Jump
Space to swap character
R to restart level

Credits:

Aaron Brownlee - Director and Programmer
Shona Callanan - Graphic Artist and Animator
Laurie Gunning - Music and Sound Designer
Lewis Binnie - Character and Level Designer
